comments: Students almost unanimously proclaimed this class to be an extraordinary educational experience, with numerous students stating that if “you really want to learn the material, take this course.”  Evaluations consistently said Dr. Weintraub truly cares about the students’ progression in the course and that he gives lots of feedback on all assignments.  Students did caution that classes generally run anywhere from 10 to 30 minutes over their designated time slot, although some students used this point to illustrate how much Dr. Weintraub cares about the material and the students’ understanding of it.
